attributes.action: Keep 5 year path of ILR for the immigrants on Post graduate visa  in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The immigrants who are already in the UK, should we follow the five year ILR route
attributes.background: Keep five year ILR path for the immigration are already in UK, The new rules only apply on the immigrants come in UK after implement

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728402
